title: As a player with Autism, I'd LOVE to have one F-ing day where I wasn't called a R%%%%%.
body:
First off... I'm going to throw riot logic back at them and say this:

A mute/filter feature isn't a justifiable reason to let players use this language.


I'm so sick of being called a r%%%%% every other game. 

It really isn't that hard to program your chat feature to completely filter that word out.

In pseudocode "IF String = "R%%%%%" then ****"


I shouldn't have to mute someone over being called a r%%%%% because they shouldn't be able to use the fucking word in the first place.



You people that use r%%%%% as an insult are fucking animals. People with my conditions and similar hurt themselves and or kill themselves over being called that. For people like me... the insults can stick with us for days and weeks.


Your not funny, your not cool. Your a fucking asshole.


There is no legitimate FUCKING reason for someone to use the word R%%%%% in league.


Yes I know there is a medical use of that word... but the people going around using it aren't using it for medical reasons now are they?


I don't mean to go on a tirade... but after being called a r%%%%% all day.. and getting called one in the last match... then saying.. hey thats not cool. I'm autistic that's highly offensive... then being called a R%%%%% 8 more times... yeah I'm pretty pissed right now.. and yeah I did some things I regretted. 



I need to be able to see chat to know whats going with the team. If I use the mute feature.. I'm already losing 50% of my total communication with the team. 100% if they start being an asshole and pinging me for no reason. If I don't mute chat and pings.. I have to sit there and be harassed and insulted.

The truth is, this term is still valid and used both colloquially and professionally.  In law i t refers to someone under an IQ of 80. The term has morphed over time into synonyms which have also just morphed into the same insult because just as calling someone a weakling is an eternal instinct since strength is often an important basic element of human physiology, intellect is also, and additionally intellect is tied to potential capacity and threat level just as strength is, which means you're claiming people are effectively inferior to you when you say this. The insult is a challenge of dominance and flailing around about it will usually result in your social credibility lost, at which point you will in effect fulfill the insult as you have been dropped lower on the social hierarchy.


Because I'm so bad at social interaction I  had to learn psych principals in order to basic function in society and I have to often consciously appeal to instinct trends in order to get anything done because I talk funny, have issues looking people in the eyes, and really suck at comprehending other perspectives on the fly, I am effectively r%%%%%ed in Emotional intelligence and am fairly above average  in mechanical and mathematical intelligence.  Note i'm not claiming to be a genius in any way nor am I huffing my own farts, I'm telling you that a basic survival skill of aspies is effectively to understand dominance posturing in order to avoid being mocked out of work places.

But just because I'm a  perpetual black sheep does not mean I have any right of comeuppance or field leveling. Just as people aren't entitled to me spending my time helping them fix their computers and cars, I'm not entitled to their social grace. It's an innate skill, I suck at it, I don't deserve to command how others utilize it.

 Actually the way I've bought the least hostility and most respect in my life was to A.) Stand my ground on my principals not on nitpicking and B.) Accept criticism even if delivered poorly. Outright disrespect however I don't tolerate but I cut that cord easily enough by not raging, and depending on the situation either using calm and friendly response or assertive dismissal, that being said I'm not so petty as to say "You're not allowed to state your subjective opinion on my shortcomings when they affect your life because I'm bad at something".

Frankly you get more respect from being calm and collected  (Even when i'm heated) then you do from getting all triggered and crying over the choice of words a bully uses to try to antagonize you, in effect proving their point (As I said the insult is effectively calling you a lesser) because you're reacting in exactly the way they want you to. Do you think you can be emotionally stable with a thin skin as a black sheep? Do you think you earn any respect by proclaiming your weaknesses as some sort of a defense? It's like a guy with glasses talking shit and then going "YoUcAnTpUnChMeIhAvEgLaSsEs" to a bunch of hell's angels who don't give a shit about that.
